thread.title: Wisden features Virat Kohli on cover, only the second Indian cricketer to be so honoured
thread.title_full: Wisden features Virat Kohli on cover, only the second Indian cricketer to be so honoured - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Wisden features Virat Kohli on cover, only the second Indian cricketer to be so honoured
text:
Booth says Kohli’s form at this juncture potrays him as the cricketer of this generation.(Reuters) The iconic Wisden magazine cover page has been graced by Sachin Tendulkar , but now the iconic retired Indian cricketer has been replaced by ace batsman and captain of Team India, Virat Kohli . ‘Wisden Cricketers’ is regarded as the ‘Bible of cricket’ and is one of the best selling English cricket magazines. On 2014 Sachin Tendulkar for the first time had featured on the cover of this magazine, making him the first Indian cricketer to have appeared on the cover. Two years later it is none other than Kohli who is ruling the cover page and that is because of his incredible performance.
